Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
* S3 storage quota is limited to 2GB per user per month
* App servers will generate presigned urls to be used to upload directrly from client machine to S3 (to avoid the cost of data transfer throw loadbalancer and app servers)
* RDS instances are running in a single AZ
* RDS instance of the read-replica is running into the same region of the master instance
